string.text: A stack of small bills, likely taken from some grocery store cash register. \n
Medium stack of rubles with moderate to high monetary amount. Bills are still crisp. \n
A large stack of rubles worth a lot. Did this come from a bank robbery? \n
A fat ass stack of money. This is enough to put a target on your head. \n
Stolen bank card from some poor stalker. Sometimes large purchases are done electronically in the Zone for safety reasons; this is a common card and not likely to have a lot of money in the account.

Credit card from an international lending firm. While said firms have a decent amount of fraud protection, it is possible to perform a little bit of clever transacting to pull some money out of this before they find out.

Quite a fancy-looking Western card. Like with other credit cards, these types of cards have sophisticated fraud protection - however, owners of such cards often make frivolous and ridiculous purchases so it is quite easy to get away with a lot of money. Not they would mind, anyway - better to ensure your survival than being wasted on another bottle of champagne or escort.
